mapper.select: SELECT news.id, news.title, news.preview, news.date, news.image, news.link, news.provider, news.readcnt, mapping_social.social_corpcode FROM news INNER JOIN mapping_social ON news.id = mapping_social.news_id INNER JOIN social_corporations ON mapping_social.social_corpcode = social_corporations.code WHERE social_corporations.code=#{corpCode} AND date=#{newsDate} ORDER BY news.id DESC LIMIT #{page}, 5

SELECT news.id, news.title, news.preview, news.date, news.image, news.link, news.provider, news.readcnt, mapping_social.social_corpcode FROM news INNER JOIN mapping_social ON news.id = mapping_social.news_id INNER JOIN social_corporations ON mapping_social.social_corpcode =social_corporations.code WHERE date=#{newsDate} AND (social_corporations.code = "tm" OR social_corporations.code = "wmp" OR social_corporations.code = "cp") GROUP BY news.id ORDER BY news.id DESC, CASE WHEN CODE = "tm" THEN 1 WHEN CODE = "cp" THEN 2 WHEN CODE = "wmp" THEN 3 END ASC LIMIT #{page}, 5

SELECT news.id, mapping_social.social_corpcode FROM news INNER JOIN mapping_social ON news.id = mapping_social.news_id INNER JOIN social_corporations ON mapping_social.social_corpcode = social_corporations.code WHERE social_corporations.code=#{corpCode} AND date=#{date}

SELECT news.id, mapping_social.social_corpcode FROM news INNER JOIN mapping_social ON news.id = mapping_social.news_id INNER JOIN social_corporations ON mapping_social.social_corpcode = social_corporations.code WHERE date=#{newsDate} GROUP BY news.id ORDER BY CASE WHEN CODE = "tm" THEN 1 WHEN CODE = "cp" THEN 2 WHEN CODE = "wmp" THEN 3 WHEN CODE ="etc" THEN 4 END ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news(id, title, preview, DATE, image, link, provider, readcnt) SELECT #{newsID}, #{newsTitle}, #{newsPreview}, #{newsDate}, #{newsImage}, #{newsLink}, #{newsProvider}, 0 FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM news WHERE id=#{newsID})

INSERT INTO mapping_social(social_corpcode, news_id) SELECT #{newsSocialCorpCode}, #{newsID} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT social_corpcode, news_id FROM mapping_social WHERE social_corpcode=#{newsSocialCorpCode} AND news_id=#{newsID})
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET readcnt=readcnt+1 WHERE id=#{newsID};
